translations: 向……发垃圾邮件（spam 的 ing 形式）

sentences.sentence: Worst of all, what if someone starts spamming your brain?
sentences.translation: 最糟糕的是，如果有人开始向你的大脑肆意滥发垃圾意识图像，怎么办？

sentences.sentence: Craigslist tries to stop spamming by checking for duplicate submissions.
sentences.translation: Craigslist想通过检查重复的提交来制止Spam。

sentences.sentence: One of the major abuses of search engines early on in their history was meta tag spamming.
sentences.translation: 搜索引擎在其早期历史中被滥用的一个主要表现是恶意元标记（meta tag spamming）。
